name: Disaster Square!
description:
Disaster Squares is a tricky but fun game where you play as a square trying to survive in a VERY dangerous place, this is my first real game so it's not the best but its still alright, the game may get updates but I'm not sure yet. 

HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE?

CONTROLS!

arrows keys to move

and avoid the dangers

if you get game over, just reload the page or leave and then re enter the game
